groups.name: Things That Fly (Or So They Say)
Things You Put On or In Your Bag
Colors You See in a Rainbow

easy.notes: Categories: Sunny Things (things connected with sunny weather), Things That Fly (objects that move through the air), Bag Items (common things people carry), Colors in a rainbow (basic color names). Near-miss temptation avoided: none obvious here; items clearly fit their group.

medium.notes: Categories: Word Builders uses base words that pair with common verbs to form familiar new words; Prefix Pals uses common prefixes; Slow and Steady contains animals or items associated with slow motion; Kitchen Helpers lists everyday kitchen items. Near-miss temptation: 'plate' could be a plate in kitchen or a 'plate' as a flat object; kept clearly in kitchen context to avoid overlap.

hard.notes: Categories: Hidden Signals uses ideas of cues and hints in a subtle way; Shapes in Motion groups basic shapes but with a motion-related hint in group name; Little Machines combines everyday tools that have simple mechanical features; Garden Guests lists small garden critters. Near-miss temptation: 'signal' might reference both a signal and signaling devices; clarified by focusing on communication cues as the connection rather than literal devices.
